backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining all core data types (Product, Order, Cart, Review, Notification, etc.) and state maps for an e-commerce platform called Mosslight Studios, with mixins for storage and authorization.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report JSON file with no features listed.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one-to-two sentence summaries of all frontend source files, describing each component's purpose and key implementation details.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS entry file defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark theme color tokens including background, foreground, chart, and sidebar variables.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell for the Mosslight Studios SPA, mounting the React app at the root div and loading the main TSX entry point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that configures TanStack Router with all application routes (storefront, admin, forum, etc.) and wraps the app with ThemeProvider, AdminAuthProvider, and Toaster.
frontend/src/components/AccessDeniedScre: Full-page access denied UI component with a shield icon, descriptive message, and a button to navigate back to the home page.
Cart button component that handles quantity input and variant selection validation before calling the addItemToCart mutation, showing appropriate error toasts for inventory or selection issues.
frontend/src/components/AdminGuard.tsx: Route guard component that shows a loading skeleton while checking admin authentication status, then renders children or an AccessDeniedScreen based on the result.
Modal dialog for admin passcode authentication that validates an 8-digit input, calls the login hook, and redirects to the admin dashboard on success.
frontend/src/components/AdminNotificatio: Displays a panel of unread admin and low-inventory notifications with options to mark each as read, showing a loading spinner while fetching.
frontend/src/components/AdminReplyForm.t: Renders a reply form for admin users to post responses to a specific discussion post, hidden from non-admin users.
Provides a textarea form for authenticated users to submit new discussion questions, showing an error if the user is not logged in.
frontend/src/components/CustomerMessages: Renders a list of messages sent to a customer from Mosslight Studios, labeling broadcast messages as announcements.
frontend/src/components/DiscussionPostLi: Displays a sorted list of discussion posts as clickable cards showing the question, status badge, timestamp, and reply count.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Site footer showing social media links, copyright year, and a 'Built with caffeine.ai' attribution link.
frontend/src/components/GalleryItem.tsx: Renders a single gallery card with an optional media image, content text, badge, and timestamp, recording an analytics view event on mount.
frontend/src/components/GalleryUploadFor: Form for uploading gallery content with optional media files, showing upload progress and submitting via the addSocialMediaContent mutation.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Sticky site header with navigation links, cart item count badge, notification bell, admin access button, and Internet Identity login/logout handling.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Root layout component that wraps all pages with a sticky Header, a main content outlet, and a Footer.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Renders a login/logout button using Internet Identity; when authenticated, displays a truncated principal with a copy-to-clipboard option.
Form component for composing and sending broadcast messages, using the useSendMessage hook and displaying success/error toasts.
frontend/src/components/MessageHistory.t: Displays a list of sent messages as cards, showing timestamp, broadcast/direct badge, content, and optional recipient.
frontend/src/components/MyOrderCard.tsx: Renders a single customer order card with item details, variant info, per-line totals, and an order status badge.
frontend/src/components/NotificationBell: Dropdown notification bell that fetches unread notifications, displays them with type-specific icons and relative timestamps, and marks them as read on click.
frontend/src/components/OrderList.tsx: Admin order list with search filtering and inline status update controls, displaying order details and totals for each order.
frontend/src/components/OrderStatusBadge: Simple badge component that maps an OrderStatus value to a styled Badge with an appropriate label and variant.
Badge component that renders a styled label for PostStatus values ('open' or 'answered') with color-coded styles.
frontend/src/components/PrincipalDisplay: Banner component that shows the authenticated user's full Internet Identity principal with a copy-to-clipboard button.
frontend/src/components/ProductCard.tsx: Displays a single product as a clickable card with image, name, price, stock status, and star ratings. Records a product click analytics event when the card is clicked.
frontend/src/components/ProductFilterSid: Renders a collapsible filter sidebar for products with category, price range, color, and size filters. Derives available filter options from the product list and exposes active filter state via callbacks.
frontend/src/components/ProductForm.tsx: Form component for creating or editing a product, handling fields like name, SKU, price, inventory, images, variants, and tags. Supports both add and update mutations with image upload progress tracking.
frontend/src/components/ProductReviews.t: Displays a list of product reviews with star ratings, verified purchase badges, and timestamps for a given product ID. Shows an average rating summary when reviews exist.
frontend/src/components/ProductSearch.ts: Provides a search input and price range selector to filter a product list client-side. Calls onFilterChange with the filtered results whenever search term or price range changes.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal dialog that collects a new user's name, email, and shipping address on first login. Submits the data via the saveCallerUserProfile mutation and blocks dismissal until the form is completed.
frontend/src/components/ReplyList.tsx: Renders a chronologically sorted list of admin replies, each displayed in a styled card with an Admin badge and formatted timestamp.
frontend/src/components/ReviewForm.tsx: A form component that allows authenticated users to submit a star rating and text review for a product, with validation and error handling via toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/SocialMediaLinks: Renders a row of social media icon links (Instagram, Facebook, TikTok) pointing to the Moss Light Studios accounts.
frontend/src/components/VariantManager.t: A CRUD UI component for managing product variants (size, color, price, inventory), supporting add, edit, and delete operations with form validation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: A React Query hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous ICP backend actor based on the current Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminAuth.tsx: A React context provider and hook that manages admin authentication via a hardcoded passcode with 24-hour session storage, and auto-detects admin status via Internet Identity using the backend's registerOrLogin/isCallerAdmin calls.
frontend/src/hooks/useAnalytics.ts: Provides React Query hooks to fetch aggregated analytics data (clicks, views, revenue, orders, low inventory) and to record analytics events via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useCart.ts: Provides React Query hooks for viewing the cart, adding items, clearing the cart, and checking out, each invalidating relevant query caches on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useCustomerMessages.t: A React Query hook that fetches the current user's messages from the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useCustomerOrders.ts: Provides React Query hooks to fetch all orders or a single order for the currently authenticated customer.
frontend/src/hooks/useDiscussionBoard.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching all discussion posts, a single thread, creating a new post, and adding replies, with cache invalidation on mutations.
frontend/src/hooks/useGallery.ts: Provides React Query hooks to fetch social media gallery content and a stub mutation for uploading new content (not yet implemented in the backend).
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and hook for Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and identity state management using DFINITY's AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useMessages.ts: Custom hooks for fetching messages and sending messages to customers via the backend actor using React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotifications.ts: Custom hooks for fetching unread notifications and marking notifications as read via the backend actor using React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useOrders.ts: Custom hooks for fetching orders and updating order status via the backend actor using React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useProducts.ts: Custom hooks for CRUD operations on products (get, add, update, delete) via the backend actor, with permission and auth error handling using React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useProductVariants.ts: Custom hook for fetching product variants for a given product ID via the backend actor using React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useReviews.ts: Custom hooks for fetching product reviews with average rating and submitting new reviews via the backend actor using React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Custom hooks for fetching and saving the caller's user profile and role via the backend actor using React Query.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file that sets up Tailwind CSS and defines Mosslight Studios brand color tokens for both light and dark modes, along with base typography styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the React app wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Static About page for Mosslight Studios displaying the studio's story, mission, and contact/social media information.
frontend/src/pages/AdminAnalyticsPage.ts: Admin page displaying analytics metrics including total revenue, order count, product clicks, content views, and low inventory alerts, protected by AdminGuard.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Admin dashboard landing page showing navigation cards for all admin sections (products, orders, messages, gallery, forum, analytics) along with a notifications panel.
frontend/src/pages/AdminGalleryPage.tsx: Admin page for uploading and managing gallery/social media content, rendering the GalleryUploadForm component inside an AdminGuard.
frontend/src/pages/AdminMessagesPage.tsx: Admin page with tabbed interface for composing new customer messages and viewing message history, protected by AdminGuard.
frontend/src/pages/AdminOrdersPage.tsx: Admin page that fetches and displays all customer orders using the OrderList component, protected by AdminGuard.
frontend/src/pages/AdminProductsPage.tsx: Admin page for managing the product catalog with the ability to add, edit, and delete products, toggling between a product grid and a ProductForm.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Shopping cart page that displays cart items with product details, calculates totals, and provides options to clear the cart or proceed to checkout.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Checkout page that displays pre-filled shipping info from the user profile and a demo payment form, placing an order on submission and redirecting to an order success page.
frontend/src/pages/FAQPage.tsx: Renders a static FAQ page organized into four categories (Shipping, Returns, Product Care, Ordering) using an accordion component for collapsible Q&A items.
frontend/src/pages/ForumPage.tsx: Displays a discussion board page with a form to ask new questions and a list of recent posts fetched via the useDiscussionPosts hook.
frontend/src/pages/ForumThreadPage.tsx: Shows a single forum thread by postId, displaying the question, status badge, timestamp, replies list, and an admin reply form.
frontend/src/pages/GalleryPage.tsx: Renders a gallery page that fetches social media content and displays it in a responsive grid alongside social media follow links.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page featuring a hero section with background image, a three-feature highlights section, and a call-to-action section linking to products and gallery.
frontend/src/pages/MyOrdersPage.tsx: Authenticated account page showing the user's orders and messages in tabs, with a profile setup modal for new users and an access denied screen for unauthenticated visitors.
frontend/src/pages/OrderSuccessPage.tsx: Confirmation page shown after a successful order, displaying the order ID and buttons to view orders or continue shopping.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailPage.tsx: Product detail page that fetches a product and its variants, supports size/color selection, displays price and stock status, and includes add-to-cart, reviews, and review form components.
frontend/src/pages/ProductsPage.tsx: Renders the main products listing page with text search, sidebar attribute filters (category, price range, color, size), and a responsive grid of ProductCard components. Combines search and sidebar filters using memoized logic.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utility functions for reading URL query parameters (supporting both standard and hash-based routing), persisting them to sessionStorage, and cleaning sensitive params from the URL hash without a page reload.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom design tokens including oklch-based semantic colors, emerald/nude brand palettes, custom fonts (Playfair Display, Inter), shadows, border radii, and accordion animations, with typography, container-queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks project state at version 3, recording a pending fix request (AR-1) to replace all GBP (Â£) currency formatting with USD ($) formatting across the entire frontend.
